name: Super Ball Heroes
description:
Super Ball Heroes is a simple casual game for boys and girls that lets you throw balls like it's nobody's business! Aim well to give your ball a nice kick that it needs to get to the top!

Tap away to dash over obstacles and get the best high score!

What are you waiting for? It's time to tap to the top! Install now to enjoy this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
